verses.verse: My <WG3450> brethren <WG80>, have <WG2192> not <WG3361> the faith <WG4102> of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, the Lord of glory <WG1391>, with <WG1722> respect of persons <WG4382>.

And <WG2532> ye have respect <WG1914> to <WG1909> him that weareth <WG5409> the gay <WG2986> clothing <WG2066>, and <WG2532> say <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Sit <WG2521> thou <WG4771> here <WG5602> in a good place <WG2573>; and <WG2532> say <WG2036> to the poor <WG4434>, Stand <WG2476> thou <WG4771> there <WG1563>, or <WG2228> sit <WG2521> here <WG5602> under <WG5259> my <WG3450> footstool <WG5286>: in: or, well, or, seemly
Are ye <WG1252> not <WG3756> then <WG2532> partial <WG1252> in <WG1722> yourselves <WG1438>, and <WG2532> are become <WG1096> judges <WG2923> of evil <WG4190> thoughts <WG1261>?

But <WG1161> ye <WG5210> have despised <WG818> the poor <WG4434>. Do <WG2616> not <WG3756> rich men <WG4145> oppress <WG2616> you <WG5216>, and <WG2532> draw <WG846> <WG1670> you <WG5209> before <WG1519> the judgment seats <WG2922>?

If <WG1487> <WG3305> ye fulfil <WG5055> the royal <WG937> law <WG3551> according to <WG2596> the scripture <WG1124>, Thou shalt love <WG25> thy <WG4675> neighbour <WG4139> as <WG5613> thyself <WG4572>, ye do <WG4160> well <WG2573>:
But <WG1161> if <WG1487> ye have respect to persons <WG4380>, ye commit <WG2038> sin <WG266>, and are convinced <WG1651> of <WG5259> the law <WG3551> as <WG5613> transgressors <WG3848>.
For <WG1063> whosoever <WG3748> shall keep <WG5083> the whole <WG3650> law <WG3551>, and yet <WG1161> offend <WG4417> in <WG1722> one <WG1520> point, he is <WG1096> guilty <WG1777> of all <WG3956>.

For <WG1063> he that said <WG2036>, Do <WG3431> not <WG3361> commit adultery <WG3431>, said <WG2036> also <WG2532>, Do <WG5407> not <WG3361> kill <WG5407>. Yea <WG235>, a man <WG5100> may say <WG2046>, Thou <WG4771> hast <WG2192> faith <WG4102>, and I <WG2504> have <WG2192> works <WG2041>: shew <WG1166> me <WG3427> thy <WG4675> faith <WG4102> without <WG1537> thy <WG4675> works <WG2041>, and I <WG2504> will shew <WG1166> thee <WG4671> my <WG3450> faith <WG4102> by <WG1537> my <WG3450> works <WG2041>. without: some copies read, by

Was <WG1344> not <WG3756> Abraham <WG11> our <WG2257> father <WG3962> justified <WG1344> by <WG1537> works <WG2041>, when he had offered <WG399> Isaac <WG2464> his <WG846> son <WG5207> upon <WG1909> the altar <WG2379>?
